title: dhasamimampahi
sahitya:
dAsamimam pAhi bhO mahAprabhO shrI satpurEshvara lOkEshvara shambhO

anupallavi

 lAsarasa nirbhara hE naTEshvara bhAsa mAnAmrta rashmi kalAdhara

caraNam

 pankaja bANa hara paramEshvara pannaga hAra hara nIlakandhara 
shankara shAstra vihAra parAtpara sharva vana tulasIvilva tatpara
